Who We Are

We consider ourselves problem solvers first and foremost. We are passionate technologists and learners who believe a strong team shares common goals and values.

MEET THE TEAM

Alumni

We’ve previously been employed by some amazing companies.

How We Work

We are a close-knit team of colleagues and friends working on products we love. We believe great teams develop trust and confidence in each other through strong personal relationships.

What We Value

Our team is founded on common goals and values, and we strive to reflect these in our daily work.

  1. Lifelong learning & Mentoring

    Learning from and mentoring each other ensures we continuously grow stronger as individuals as well as a team.

  2. Craftsmanship

    Having true passion for our craft sets a standard to aim for as a team. We see the beauty in true craftsmanship.

  3. Honest Communication

    Productive partnerships are built on strong communication, where empathy and honesty is key.

  4. New technologies

    We don't have a go-to stack and are always on the hunt for new technologies to add to our utility belt.

  5. Zero HIERARCHY

    Confidence without attitude. Everyone in our team is a multidisciplinary problem solver who deserves to be heard.

  6. Humility & Curiosity

    Every day we seek to challenge ourselves to continually improve as a collective and as individuals.

Software & Product Apprenticeships

We feel it is important to give back to an industry that has been inclusive, supportive and encouraging for us while starting out. For junior level hires, we predominately look for accelerated learners - people that show potential and the willingness to learn - rather than hard manifested skills. We support your development form entry level hire to craftsman of your field, by guided and individualized mentoring, educational resources, as well as a welcoming, fostering and understanding culture.

Join us

Perks & Benefits

What you can expect from working at code & co.

  • Steep Learning Curve

    Throw yourself in the deep end, surrounded by support. Learn everything from client-facing consulting to growing a digital venture.

  • Grow Your Network

    Together, we’re better than one. We believe that the success of code & co. as a company is only possible when you succeed as an individual.

  • Funded Development

    As a fully bootstrapped company, we have the luxury to experiment and explore. If you identify a solution to a problem, together, we can bring it live.

  • Choose Your Hardware

    We use technology to produce impactful work and we’ll make sure your utility belt is up to the challenges of every day.

  • Flexible Working Hours

    Output matters and just that. You will be measured by your work and not by b/s politics that involve "face time" or similar measures.

  • Flexible Vacation Policy

    We value you as an individual and we require your best work. We want to make sure you’re physically and mentally in a state to provide your greatest input.

  • Central Berlin Office

    Our central office at Rosenthaler Platz is right at the epicenter of entrepreneurial dreams and Berlin itself is a fun and beautiful city to live in.

  • Food and Drinks

    We all perform best when we are comfortable at work. Snacks, coffee and regular team lunches keep us on point throughout the day.

  • Education Budget

    We believe in lifelong learning. Each employee has a generous education budget they can use for leveling up.

  • BE YOURSELF

    We’re an international team from different backgrounds and with a diverse skill set. Every day we come together to make everyone’s input heard, seen – and built.

Join Us!

While we don’t actively advertise open job positions, we are always on the look out for interesting personalities. If you would like to join us or just find out how we work, please reach out.
